long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience into a focused sanctuary with intelligent website blocking that works for you.

Take control of your digital life with zenzen, the thoughtful website blocker that helps you create sustainable focus habits and reclaim hours of productive time.

Master your browsing environment with powerful yet simple controls. Create personalized block lists, establish focused workspaces, and build better online habits that last. Everything stays private on your device, ensuring your browsing data remains yours alone.

Features include:
✓ One-click website blocking with smart scheduling
✓ Custom lists management for different focus needs
✓ Private, device-only data storage
✓ Flexible blocking patterns and rules

Try zenzen free and join users who've transformed their browsing habits. Install now and experience the difference a focused digital space can make.

Questions or feature requests? We're constantly improving zenzen based on user feedback. DM us at https://www.instagram.com/zenzen.app/ - we'd love to hear from you!
